1111011011101100 0010000100010111 0 -> sum: 0001100000000011, cout: 1
0010100011100011 0011101110011000 0 -> sum: 0110010001111011, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
